xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="v)p=U8sC*WYra0aM|iOC" x="313" y="287">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="controls_loop_forever" id="8W.f8o2nGD7(hnfVe!)*">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="bit_button_event" id="[9)8T:?%D=P_2;/`^ZQO">
            <field name="var_">_bit_btnA_</field>
            <field name="event_">pressed</field>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id="uRM)z0M!,REL8!?5A!_(">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="LS,`p3]*7cMKSFrFm-}P">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="pMCPiT!29}WC2UjSyuqn">
                    <field name="TEXT">kai</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="radio_channel_get" id="~:Ja3iQc=J:ARa-+xWxU">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="SquD?Cd`jIH]~siAI*fC">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="9fR*DP#fWQ^Kxo;MU]I`">
                    <field name="type_">1</field>
                    <field name="speed_">0</field>
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                    <value name="str_">
                      <block type="radio_channel_value" id="/~AGJ^x?gZbBdJ~62dXI"></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="color_">
                      <block type="colour_picker" id="nbxs{}|z|N*-8ZI-T57}">
                        <field name="COLOUR">#00cccc</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <next>
                      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="DWfw[`E8_9;cv3Uc=.(}">
                        <field name="music_">m1</field>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="bit_button_event" id="CyPXYDD5oL9M;g}+FF9=">
                    <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
                    <field name="event_">pressed</field>
                    <statement name="do_">
                      <block type="bit_matrix_off" id="^B8t+(|.T`W|hz[cBRb]"></block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="delay" id="APgC];ObP]),LtuB{HO,">
                        <value name="secs_">
                          <block type="math_number" id="G#)o~oKUfw12q.Q(+fj7">
                            <field name="NUM">2</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
